column2: to the Sanlam Group's Information Security Policies
column3: the content of which all users
column4: are aware of and which can be found on the Group Intranet and/or the Intranet sites of the Group Companies.
column5: Users abusing the facility in any manner
column7: incorrect usage can be precluded from using the facility and be
column9: All users accept and consent to the Sanlam Group's right to access
column11: and intercept any user's electronic communication records in the
column12: ordinary course of carrying on its business
column15: If such monitoring reveals possible evidence of wrongful or criminal
column17: such evidence will be provided to the relevant authorities.
column18: By Clicking on “OK” and logging onto this system indicates your
column19: acceptance of all above-mentioned terms and conditions.

WS2012-MSSB-49~Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on~HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System\LegalNoticeText~This Facility is for the use by authorized users only and is subject
column2: to the Sanlam Group's Information Security Policies
column3: the content of which all users
column4: are aware of and which can be found on the Group Intranet and/or the Intranet sites of the Group Companies.
column5: Users abusing the facility in any manner
column7: incorrect usage can be precluded from using the facility and be
column9: All users accept and consent to the Sanlam Group's right to access
column11: and intercept any user's electronic communication records in the
column12: ordinary course of carrying on its business
column15: If such monitoring reveals possible evidence of wrongful or criminal
column17: such evidence will be provided to the relevant authorities.
column18: By Clicking on “OK” and logging onto this system indicates your
column19: acceptance of all above-mentioned terms and conditions.
